Package alix.lucene.search

Class Corpus

java.lang.Object
alix.lucene.search.Corpus
public class Corpus
extends java.lang.Object
This object handle information of a “corpus” : a set of docId in a lucene index. These docId are grouped by a label, a “bookid”, indexed as a StringField and a SortedDocValuesField (efficient for faceting); so a book can contain multiple “chapters“ (documents). User should maintain unicity of his bookdids. These bookids allow to keep a stable reference between different lucene index states. They can be stored as a json string.
